roleset.name: handling, dealing with/in

role.descr: thing dealt with or in (topic/domain, not co-dealer)

roles.note: This nominalization takes syntax that is somewhere between the deal-v.01(handling) and deal-n.01(transacting) rolesets. I'm breaking up dealing.01 and .02 based on syntactic behavior rather than the semantic distinctions shown in deal-v and deal-n, which looks like it's going to put 'drug dealing' into dealing.02. So, fair warning.

example.name: both args with co-dealer
example.text: What is you stance on his dealing with China about Sikkim and Tibet ??!!!

example.name: both args: dealing in
example.text: the prohibition against their dealing in new articles of clothing;

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, deal-n.01, deal-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls cope-83.

roleset.name: distributing

example.name: drug dealing
example.text: Once drug dealing -LRB- AKA beer , wine , and liquor sales -RRB- became legal and regulated , murders in America dropped dramatically .
example.arg: -LRB- AKA beer, wine, and liquor sales -RRB-

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: While it starts off with Duke discussing how to narrow your decisions in a hand (complete with her dealing the cards to give examples), it eventually comes off as a little scattered.

example.name: All args- metaphorical distribution
example.text: I was wondering if you would care to expound on the bit about Napoleon and his dealing a blow to the catholic church ?!

example.name: all args
example.text: Radomski is describing his use of steroids and his dealing drugs to athletes.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, deal-n.02, deal-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls give-13.1
